description: A component that renders a styled-container or card for basic account.

balanceLabel.description: The text to be placed above the amount.

balanceLabelForSecondaryAmount.description: The text to be placed above the amount.

secondaryAmount.description: The card secondary amount value.(e.g. Available amount is primary and booked balance is secondary).

selected.description: Whether the card is selected. This removes any check mark on the item when active=true. Defaults to false.

showCurrencySymbol.description: Whether the item should show the currency symbol. Defaults to true.

status.description: The current account status. Accepts closed, inactive or active.

type.description: The type of icon to be displayed when selected=true.

active.description: Whether the card should have a check icon. Defaults to true.

favorite.description: Whether the card should be marked as favourite. Defaults to false.

favoriteIconColor.description: The color of the favourite icon when favorite=true. Defaults to primary.

highlight.description: Whether the amount and currency value should be highlighted.

productNumberFormat.description: Configuration of how the product number should be formatted. Defaults to the following format: { length: 16, maskRange: [0, 12], segments: 4 }
